title: block_capabilities
content: # `prefect.server.api.block_capabilities` Routes for interacting with block capabilities. ## Functions ### `read_available_block_capabilities` ```python theme={null} read_available_block_capabilities(db: PrefectDBInterface = Depends(provide_database_interface)) -> List[str] ``` Get available block capabilities. For more information, see [https://docs.prefect.io/v3/concepts/blocks](https://docs.prefect.io/v3/concepts/blocks).
